Text: What on earth does "streamline Mythbusters" MEAN? And why does it involve brand new uploads of three-year-old episodes? Why would anyone download material they've had for three years, just because you put the word "streamline" in front of it?

For those who aren't in the know, Streamlined edits are the only way to watch Mythbusters. It removes all the repeat introduction shots, flashbacks, cartoons and other crap that get in the way of a good episode. 

It also consolidated each myth into one section.

http://www.baekdal.com/insights/dissecting-an-episode-of-mythbusters
